faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The course introduces the basic concepts of operations and supply chain management, the principles of value creation and experience curve effects. Students will learn the different types of processes in production and services, and the principles for choosing/designing the suitable management systems for them. Also, students will learn different types of supply chain and their functioning principles in the light of their applicability in practice with several examples. In addition, they will learn operation scheduling rules and their implementation.
description.et: Kursuse raames tutvutakse operatsioonide ja tarneahela juhtimise põhimõistete, väärtuse loomise põhimõtete ja nendega seotud kogemuskõveraefektiga. Õpitakse tundma erinevaid protsesside tüüpe tootmises ja teeninduses ning nende juhtimiseks sobilike protsesside juhtimissüsteemide valiku põhimõtteid. Samuti õpitakse erinevaid tarneahela tüüpe ja nende toimimise seaduspärasusi ning arutletakse nende praktilise rakendatavuse üle tuues näiteid ettevõtete reaalsetest tegevustest. Lisaks õpitakse protsesside järjestamist - järjestusreegleid ning nende rakendamist.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give an understanding about the operation and supply chain management, and knowledge about the methods for improving the operations and supply chain management.
objectives.et: Loengukursuse eesmärgiks on anda ülevaade operatsioonide ja tarneahela juhtimisest ning õpetada operatsioonide ja tarneahela juhtimise tõhustamiseks kasutatavaid meetodeid.

learning_outcomes.en: a) has an overview about the operation and supply chain management;
learning_outcomes.et: a) omab ülevaadet operatsioonide ja tarneahela juhtimisest;

learning_outcomes.en: b) knows process typology of production and services;
learning_outcomes.et: b) tunneb tootmise ja teeninduse protsessipõhist tüpoloogiat;

learning_outcomes.en: c) knows the process based operation unit design;
d) knows the principles of scheduling for flexible processes;
learning_outcomes.et: d) teab operatsioonide järjestamise põhimõtteid paindlikes protsessides;

learning_outcomes.en: e) is able to scheduling operations in flexible processes;
learning_outcomes.et: e) oskab järjestada operatsioone paindlikes protsessides;

learning_outcomes.en: f) can distinguish logistics from supply chain management;
learning_outcomes.et: f) oskab eristada logistikat ja tarneahela juhtimist;

learning_outcomes.en: g) knows the main types of supply chains;
h) possesses an overview of the impact of supply chains on individual firms and  the society.
learning_outcomes.et: h) omab ülevaadet tarneahelate mõjust ettevõtetele ja ühiskonnale.

notes.et: Feed-back for individual and group home assignments will be during in seminars only.

grade_preconditions.et:
All home assignments should be submitted at time and "passed" as well as have been taken part from seminars. Participation in workshop and three seminars are compulsory. Students who will miss the seminar No.4 need to fulfill assignments no.5a and no.5b before the seminar (see deadlines from mooldle).

Feed-back for home assignments no.1 (a and b), and no.8 will be oral during in seminars only.

grade_evaluation.et: Final evaluation - "passed"/"failed". "Passed" if all home and seminar assignments has "passed" (each home assignment should be fulfilled on deadline and at least with a minimum amount 70%)

debt_elimination.et: In the next academic year when course will take place again.

description.et: Introduction to operation and supply change management: main notions; value creation; experience curve effect. Process management - from projects to continues production in manufacturing (Kurmet Kivipõld) 3h
Designing Processes in Service and Production. Quality management.  (Meelis Milder) 3h
Process-based Organizational design: BBR, JIT, Lean. (Meelis Milder) 3h
Workshop in Production factory Lasita Aken AS. (Meelis Milder)
Supply Chain - geographical location and transportation. In web 14:30 (Aurelija Burinskiene) 3h
Design of the Supply Chain and Supply Chain Strategy (Kurmet Kivipõld and Kaur Andresson) 3h
